name: CreateDraftTableRows
description:
Create draft rows in a specified HubSpot table.

This tool is used to add multiple rows to the draft version of a specified HubSpot CMS table. It allows for up to 100 rows to be created in one call. Useful for updating content drafts before publication.

parameters.name: table_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the HubSpot table to which the draft rows are being added. This is required to specify which table you want to update.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

parameters.name: draft_table_rows_data
parameters.description: A JSON array of row objects to add to the draft table. Each object can include keys like 'path', 'childTableId', 'values', 'name', and 'displayIndex'. Maximum 100 rows per call.

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: tableIdOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the table

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
